Method Detail

getAllOrganisms

java.util.List<Organism> getAllOrganisms()
Gets a list of all organisms.

Returns:
The list of all organisms, sorted alphabetically.

Gets the list of all organisms with experiment data of given type.

dataType - The data type.
Returns:
The list of organisms, sorted alphabetically.

getTransgenicCandidatesForEcNums

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Organism>> getTransgenicCandidatesForEcNums(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ecNums)
Gets the EC number to organism mapping for the given set of EC numbers. That is, for each EC number, a set of organisms whose genomes contain the loci corresponding to those EC numbers is returned and associated with that EC number in the resulting map.

Parameters:
ecNums - The EC numbers.
Returns:
THe EC number to organism mapping.
